CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 13, 1951, pg. 11 reads: "Fall Brides- The past few weeks vied with June with the number of impressive weddings which took place on the local scene. in above photos are just a few of the many young women who became brides.  Left to right: Miss Dorothy B. McAllister, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Edward R. Brown recently was married to Willie Harris Jr. - (Harris Photo)."Cutline of related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 13, 1951, pg. 10 reads: "Couple Weds In Home Rites - Miss Dorothy B. McAllister, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Edward R. Brown, became the bride of Willie Harris Jr., recently at the home of the bride's parents.  The groom is the son of Mr. and Mrs. Willie Harris of Harvard Street, East Liberty."
TitMainTitle: Full length portrait of groom Willie Harris Jr. and bride Dorothy B. McAllister Harris wearing long sleeved satin gown with covered buttons on bodice, holding bouquet, standing on floral carpet in home of Mr. and Mrs. Edward R. Brown, another version
